Week 1

Day 1 — Chest & Biceps

09 August, 2017
Max Effort. Warm up first! Work up in weight slowly. Add weight in small increments and keep your reps to five or fewer until you reach a load that allows you only three to five reps. When you’ve maxed out those reps, move on to the next exercise.

RM = Reps Max: Heaviest you can do this many reps at before failure
Barbell Bench Press ?
Max Effort
3-5 RM
DB Bench Press ?
4
8
Machine Fly ?
5
12-15
Seated DB Biceps Curl ?
4
8
DB Hammer Curl ?
2
10
Barbell Bicep Curl ?
4
10-12
Barbell Bench Press ?
Max Effort

15 reps

4 sets
10 reps

squat rack preferred; smith machine ok

10 reps

squat rack preferred; smith machine ok; lighter weights
